trans-unit.resname: PH21·1 | Andrios, Roaming Explorer | Card Name
PH21·1 | Andrios, Roaming Explorer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PH21·1 | Andrios, Roaming Explorer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as Andrios is attacking, tapped creatures you control with base power and toughness 4/3 have base power and toughness 16/9.
trans-unit.target: As long as Andrios is attacking, tapped creatures you control with base power and toughness 4/3 have base power and toughness 16/9.

trans-unit.resname: PH21·1 | Andrios, Roaming Explorer | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. Creature spells you spend this mana to cast have their base power and toughness become 4/3.
trans-unit.target: {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. Creature spells you spend this mana to cast have their base power and toughness become 4/3.

trans-unit.resname: PH21·2 | Arteeoh, Dread Scavenger | Card Name
PH21·2 | Arteeoh, Dread Scavenger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PH21·2 | Arteeoh, Dread Scavenger | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Arteeoh deals combat damage to a player, you may exchange control of two other target artifacts. When you do, create a token that's a copy of target artifact you don't control, except it's a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token in addition to its other colors and types.
trans-unit.target: Whenever Arteeoh deals combat damage to a player, you may exchange control of two other target artifacts. When you do, create a token that's a copy of target artifact you don't control, except it's a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token in addition to its other colors and types.

trans-unit.resname: PH21·3 | Byode, Inverse Sun | Card Name
PH21·3 | Byode, Inverse Sun | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: +2: Mill three cards, then return any number of cards from different Universes milled this way from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: +2: Mill three cards, then return any number of cards from different Universes milled this way from your graveyard to your hand.

trans-unit.resname: PH21·3 | Byode, Inverse Sun | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: -X: Choose a Universe you haven't chosen this way this game. You may cast a spell from that Universe with mana value X or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: -X: Choose a Universe you haven't chosen this way this game. You may cast a spell from that Universe with mana value X or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

trans-unit.resname: PH21·3 | Byode, Inverse Sun | Card Text | Paragraph 3
PH21·3 | Byode, Inverse Sun | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: Your deck can include Universes Beyond cards of any color identity.
trans-unit.target: Your deck can include Universes Beyond cards of any color identity.

trans-unit.resname: PH21·4 | Ersta, Friend to All | Card Name
PH21·4 | Ersta, Friend to All | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Create a 1/1 Human Wizard creature token that's all colors.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Create a 1/1 Human Wizard creature token that's all colors.

trans-unit.resname: PH21·4 | Ersta, Friend to All | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−3]: Choose a card name from among Enlightened Tutor, Mystical Tutor, Booster Tutor, Imperial Recruiter, and Worldly Tutor. Create a copy of the card with the chosen name. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: [−3]: Choose a card name from among Enlightened Tutor, Mystical Tutor, Booster Tutor, Imperial Recruiter, and Worldly Tutor. Create a copy of the card with the chosen name. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

trans-unit.resname: PH21·4 | Ersta, Friend to All | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−8]: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more Wizards, you win the game."
trans-unit.target: [−8]: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more Wizards, you win the game."

trans-unit.resname: PH21·4 | Ersta, Friend to All | Card Text | Paragraph 4
